example.parse: (NP-SBJ (NP-PN (NR 台中市)) (NP (NN 警方))) (VP (NP-TMP (NT 今天)) (VP (VP (VV 抓到) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 名))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 专门)) (VP (VV 抢) (NP-OBJ (NN 通信行))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 嫌犯)))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 起出) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (NP (CP (WHPP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (PP-MNR (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VV 犯案)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 枪支))) (PRN (VP (ADVP (AD 还)) (VP (VE 有) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 来不及)) (VP (VV 销赃) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-3))))) (DEC 的))) (DNP (QP (CD 大批)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 手机))))))))))
example.arg: 犯案 的 枪支 还 有 来不及 销赃 的 大批 的 手机
